original_text:
the seers shall be disgraced,
    and the diviners put to shame;
they shall all cover their lips,
    for there is no answer from God.
korean_text: 선견자가 부끄러워하며 술객이 수치를 당하여 다 입술을 가릴 것은 하나님이 응답하지 아니하심이거니와

sentences.original_text: and the diviners put to shame
they shall all cover their lips
for there is no answer from God
